meanings.definition: The act of flying through the air.
meanings.sent1: The bird took flight from the tree.
meanings.sent2: I booked a flight to Paris for my vacation.
meanings.sent3: The flight of the paper airplane ended in a crash landing.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams took flight when she saw the shooting stars.
meanings.sent5: The flight of the butterfly was a beautiful sight in the garden.

meanings.sent1: The long flight across the ocean was tiring.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the scenic views during the flight.
meanings.sent3: The flight attendants made the journey comfortable with their service.
meanings.sent4: His mind was on a flight of fancy as he imagined exploring new lands.
meanings.sent5: The flight to the tropical island was like a dream come true.

meanings.definition: A series of stairs between landings.
meanings.sent1: She climbed the flight of stairs to reach the top floor.
meanings.sent2: The old building had a narrow flight of stairs.
meanings.sent3: The flight of stairs seemed never-ending when carrying heavy boxes.
meanings.sent4: Each step on the flight of stairs echoed in the empty hallway.
meanings.sent5: The flight of stairs in the castle was grand and imposing.
